sentences: The Secretariat introduced the issue of privileges and immunities for individuals on the Protocol's constituted bodies ( FCCC/SBI/2006/20 and FCCC/SBI/2006/21 ).
The EU said the risk of claims against individuals is not as great as some had suggested.
He proposed addressing the potential risk first with some short-term measures, and then addressing longer term issues in the context of discussions on post-2012 issues.
ARGENTINA suggested that project developers should be required to renounce their rights to take legal action against individuals on Kyoto boards.
Paul Watkinson (France) will chair a contact group.
